samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This example demonstrates the default functionalities of the JavaScript(ES5) multiselect control with minimum configuration.

samples.name: Data Binding
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to bind with local data source and fetch data from remote data service in the JavaScript(ES5) multiselect control.

samples.name: Grouping
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to group based on the different categories with individual header and icon support using the JavaScript(ES5) multiselect control.

samples.name: Template
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to customize the appearance of each item in the JavaScript(ES5) multiselect control pop-up list using the template.

samples.name: Filtering
samples.description: This example demonstrates how the filtering functionalities works based on the typed characters in the JavaScript(ES5) multiselect control.

samples.name: Custom Value
samples.description: This example demonstrates the addition of a new value that is not present in the predefined list of the JavaScript(ES5) multiselect control.

samples.name: Chip Customization
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to customize the appearance of the selected chip element in the JavaScript(ES5) multiselect control.

samples.name: CheckBox
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to select the multiple values through checkbox in the JavaScript(ES5) multiselect control.

samples.name: Selection Limit
samples.description: This example demonstrates the maximum selection limit functionalities with checkbox of the JavaScript(ES5) multiselect control.

samples.name: Diacritics Filtering
samples.description: This example demonstrates how to achieve the diacritics filter functionalities in the JavaScript(ES5) multiselect control.
